00052   typedef map<std::string, std::string> ml_tlm2_socket_map_type;

00059   // nb transport fw/bw item mapping
00060   typedef map<unsigned int,tlm_generic_payload*>   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map_type; 
00061   typedef map<tlm_generic_payload*,unsigned int>   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map_type; 
00062   typedef map<std::string, bool>                   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map_type; 
00063 
00064   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map_type           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map;
00065   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map_type                    ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map;

00068 void ml_tlm2_do_register_target(const std::string &target_socket_name, const std::string &transactor_name) {
00069     ml_tlm2_target_socket_map[target_socket_name] = target_socket_name;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void ml_tlm2_do_register_initiator(const std::string &initiator_socket_name, const std::string &transactor_name) {
00073     ml_tlm2_init_socket_map[initiator_socket_name] = initiator_socket_name;
00074 }

00076 extern void uvm_ml_do_connect (std::string port_name, std::string export_name);
00077 
00078 bool ml_tlm2_check_cross_registration(const std::string & initiator_socket_name, const std::string & target_socket_name) { 
00079     if (ml_tlm2_target_socket_map[initiator_socket_name] != "") {
00080         string err_str = "In uvm_ml_connect(): The first argument (initiator socket path) '" + initiator_socket_name + "' was registered with ML_TLM2_REGISTER_TARGET";
00081         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00082         return false;
00083     }
00084     else if (ml_tlm2_init_socket_map[target_socket_name] != "") {
00085         string err_str = "In uvm_ml_connect(): The second argument (target socket path) '" + target_socket_name + "' was registered with ML_TLM2_REGISTER_INITIATOR";
00086         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089     return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 std::string ml_tlm2_relative_path(const std::string &cur_context_name, 
00093                                   const std::string &containing_module_name, 
00094                                   const std::string &socket_name) {
00095 
00096   if (containing_module_name == cur_context_name)
00097     return "";
00098   else
00099     if ((cur_context_name.size() < containing_module_name.size()) && (containing_module_name.compare(0,cur_context_name.size(), cur_context_name) == 0) && containing_module_name[cur_context_name.size()] == '.')
00100       return containing_module_name.substr(cur_context_name.size() + 1);
00101     else {
00102       string err_str = "ML TLM2 socket " + containing_module_name + "." + socket_name + " registration is not activated from an enclosing module";
00103       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00104     }
00105   return "INTERNAL ERROR";
00106 }
00107 
00108 std::string ml_tlm2_convertor_relative_name(const std::string &cur_context_name, 
00109                                             const std::string &containing_module_name, 
00110                                             const std::string &socket_name) {
00111   const std::string &relative_path = ml_tlm2_relative_path(cur_context_name, containing_module_name, socket_name);
00112   if (relative_path != "")
00113     return (relative_path + "_" + socket_name + "_tlm2_convertor");
00114   else
00115     return(socket_name + "_tlm2_convertor");
00116 }

00118 
00119 void ml_tlm2_map_transaction(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp, unsigned int & transaction_id) {  
00120   // assign id if needed
00121   if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00122     transaction_id = uvm_ml_utils::assign_transaction_id();
00123   }
00124   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map[transaction_id] = tlm_gp;
00125   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map[tlm_gp] = transaction_id;
00126   tlm_gp->acquire();
00127 }
00128   
00129 tlm_generic_payload *ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(unsigned int id) {    
00130   map<unsigned int,tlm_generic_payload*>::iterator it = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.find(id);
00131   if (it == ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.end()) {
00132     return 0;
00133   } else {
00134     return it->second;
00135   };
00136 }
00137 
00138 unsigned int ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(tlm_generic_payload &trans) {
00139   map<tlm_generic_payload*, unsigned int>::iterator it = ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.find(&trans);
00140   if (it == ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.end()) {
00141     return ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00142   } else {
00143     return it->second;
00144   };
00145 }
00146 
00147 bool ml_tlm2_release_transaction(tlm_generic_payload * gp_ptr, unsigned int & transaction_id) {    
00148   //assert(gp_ptr != 0);
00149   if(gp_ptr == 0) {
00150     char msg[1024];
00151     sprintf(msg, "\nTransaction ID is '%s'\n", transaction_id);
00152     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: ml_tlm2_release_transaction failed due to null pointer",msg);
00153     return false;
00154   };
00155   int result = ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.erase(gp_ptr);
00156   if (result == 0) {
00157     return false;
00158   }
00159   result = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.erase(transaction_id);  
00160   if (result == 0) {
00161     return false;
00162   }  
00163   gp_ptr->release();  
00164   transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00165   return true;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void ml_tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping(const char* socket_name) {
00169   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map[socket_name] = true;
00170 }
00171 
00172 bool ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(const string &socket_name) {
00173   if (ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map.find(socket_name) == ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map.end())
00174     return false;
00175   else
00176     return ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map[socket_name];
00177 }
00178 
00179 const char* ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(tlm_phase phase) {
00180   switch (phase) {
00181   case BEGIN_REQ:
00182     return (const char*)"BEGIN_REQ";
00183   case END_REQ:
00184     return (const char*)"END_REQ";
00185   case BEGIN_RESP:
00186     return (const char*)"BEGIN_RESP";
00187   case END_RESP:
00188     return (const char*)"END_RESP";
00189   defualt:
00190     return (const char*)"invalid phase";
00191   }
00192   return (const char*)"";
00193 }
00194 
00195 const char* ml_tlm2_status_to_string(tlm_sync_enum status) {
00196   switch (status) {
00197   case TLM_COMPLETED:
00198     return (const char*)"TLM_COMPLETED";
00199   case TLM_ACCEPTED:
00200     return (const char*)"TLM_ACCEPTED";
00201   case TLM_UPDATED:
00202     return (const char*)"TLM_UPDATED";
00203   defualt:
00204     return (const char*)"invalid status";
00205   }
00206   return (const char*)"";
00207 }
00208 
00209 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(const string &socket_name, 
00210                                                const string &intf_name, 
00211                                                tlm_phase phase) {
00212   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking tranasaction did not follow the rules of the TLM2 standard.\n'" +  
00213     intf_name + "' of '" + socket_name + "' was called with phase '" + ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(phase) + 
00214     "', but the transaction was not first sent on \nthe forward path with the BEGIN_REQ phase, or already returned on the forward \n\
00215 path with the END_RESP phase or the TLM_COMPLETED status.\n";
00216   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00217 }
00218 
00219 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(const string &socket_name, 
00220                                                const string &intf_name, 
00221                                                tlm_phase phase, 
00222                                                tlm_sync_enum status) {
00223   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking tranasaction did not follow the rules of the TLM2 standard.\n'" +  
00224     intf_name + "' of '" + socket_name + "' returned with phase '" + ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(phase) + "' and status '" + 
00225     ml_tlm2_status_to_string(status) + "', but the transaction was not first sent on \nthe forward path with the BEGIN_REQ phase, " + 
00226     "or already returned on the forward \npath with the END_RESP phase or the TLM_COMPLETED status.\n";
00227   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00228 }
00229 
00230 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_mm_error(const string &socket_name) {
00231   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking tranasaction does not have a memory manager, and therfore cannot be mappeed.\n Socket '" +  
00232     socket_name + "' has transaction mapping enabled in its connection method, but no memory manager exists for the transaction.\n " +
00233     "This is not supported.\n";
00234   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());  
00235 }

00238 
00239 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) { 
00240   if (tlm_gp == NULL) { 
00241     p.pack_null(); 
00242   } 
00243   else { 
00244     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*tlm_gp)); 
00245     p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());              
00246     ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(p, tlm_gp);  
00247     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00248   } 
00249   return p; 
00250 } 
00251 
00252 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_generic_payload & tlm_gp) { 
00253   uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(tlm_gp)); 
00254   //assert (companion != NULL);
00255   if(companion == NULL) {
00256     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: packing failed due to unidentified type","");
00257   };
00258   p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());
00259   ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(p, &tlm_gp);   
00260   companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, &tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00261   return p; 
00262 }
00263 
00264 uvm_ml_packer & operator >> (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_generic_payload *& tlm_gp) { 
00265   tlm_gp = (tlm_generic_payload *) p.unpack_obj_header();
00266   if (tlm_gp) { 
00267     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*tlm_gp)); 
00268     ml_tlm2_gp_companion::unpack_tlm_generic_payload(p, tlm_gp);        
00269     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP); 
00270   } 
00271   return p; 
00272 }
00273 
00274 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_extension_base * ext) { 
00275   uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*ext)); 
00276   p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());                
00277   companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, ext, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00278   return p; 
00279 } 
00280 
00281 uvm_ml_packer & operator >> (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_extension_base *& ext) { 
00282   ext = (tlm_extension_base *) p.unpack_obj_header();
00283   if (ext) { 
00284     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*ext)); 
00285     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, ext, NULL, ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP);
00286   } 
00287   return p; 
00288 }
00289 
00291 
00292 void ml_tlm2_pack(
00293   tlm_generic_payload & val,
00294   uvm_ml_packed_obj* p
00295 ) {
00296   //uvm_ml_packer pkr;
00297   static uvm_ml_packer& pkr = uvm_ml_packer::get_the_uvm_ml_packer();
00298   pkr << val;
00299   int packed_size = pkr.get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00300   int max_size = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_bits();
00301   if (packed_size > max_size) {
00302     char msg[1024];
00303     sprintf(msg,"\nuvm_object size is %d\n"
00304             "Max size is %d\n"
00305             "uvm_object type is '%s'\n"
00306             "Consider increasing the maximum size limit with the "
00307             "irun option '-defineall UVM_PACK_MAX_SIZE=<size>'.",
00308             packed_size, max_size, ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(val)).c_str()
00309            );
00310     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_SIZE_LIMIT_,msg);
00311   }
00312   pkr.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(p);
00313   pkr.reset();
00314 }
00315 
00316 void ml_tlm2_unpack_create(
00317   uvm_ml_packed_obj* p,
00318   tlm_generic_payload*& val
00319 ) {
00320   try {
00321     static uvm_ml_packer& pkr = uvm_ml_packer::get_the_uvm_ml_packer();
00322     pkr.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(p);
00323     pkr >> val;
00324     // check if any unpack error happened;
00325     // only 2 kinds of errors are flagged:
00326     // too few bits or too many bits;
00327     // check for too few bits here, for
00328     // too many bits exception is thrown
00329     // which needs to be caught
00330     if (int rem = pkr.get_remaining_unpacked_bits()) { // implies too few bits
00331       char msg[1024];
00332       sprintf(msg,"\nFewer bits unpacked in SystemC than were packed "
00333               "for this tlm_generic_payload in foreign language. "
00334               "This may be due to a mismatch in class definitions "
00335               "across languages - the SystemC "
00336               "tlm_generic_payload object is smaller in size\n"
00337               "tlm2 transaction type is '%s'\n"
00338               "Number of remaining bits is %d\n",
00339               ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(*val)).c_str(), rem 
00340              );
00341       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00342     }
00343     pkr.reset();
00344   }
00345   // check if "too may bits" error happened
00346   catch( const sc_report& ex ) {
00347     if (strcmp(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_, ex.get_msg_type()) == 0) {
00348       // implies too may bits error
00349         UVM_ML_SC_PRINT_REPORT(ex);
00350       char msg[1024];
00351       sprintf(msg,"\nMore bits unpacked in SystemC than were packed "
00352               "for this uvm_object in foreign language. "
00353               "This may be due to a mismatch in class definitions "
00354               "across languages - the SystemC "
00355               "uvm_object is larger in size\n"
00356               "uvm_object type is '%s'\n",
00357               ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(*val)).c_str()
00358              );
00359       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00360     } else  {
00361       // not the error we are looking for, throw back
00362       throw(ex);
00363     }
00364   }
00365 }
00366 
00367 void ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(tlm_generic_payload &trans, 
00368                                        tlm_generic_payload &response_gp,
00369                                        string full_socket_name) {
00370   unsigned int length = response_gp.get_data_length();
00371   if (trans.get_data_length() != length) {
00372     string str = full_socket_name + ": " + "data_lengths in request and response transactions are different";
00373     SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", str.c_str());
00374   }
00375   if (length > 0 && response_gp.get_data_ptr())
00376     memcpy(trans.get_data_ptr(), response_gp.get_data_ptr(), length);
00377 }

00405 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::update(void * target, void * src)
00406 {
00407   update_tlm_generic_payload((tlm_generic_payload *) target, (tlm_generic_payload *) src);
00408   uvm_ml_automation(NULL, target, src, ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP);
00409 }
00410 
00411 void ml_tlm2_ext_companion::update(void * ext, void * tlm_gp)
00412 {
00413   tlm_extension_base * other_ext = get_other_ext((tlm_generic_payload *) tlm_gp);
00414   if (other_ext != NULL)
00415     uvm_ml_automation(NULL, ext, other_ext, ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP);
00416 }

00418 uvm_ml_companion_map_type & uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion_map() 
00419 { 
00420     if (companion_map == NULL)
00421       companion_map = new uvm_ml_companion_map_type();
00422 
00423     return *companion_map; 
00424 }
00425 
00426 bool uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(const type_info & actual_type, uvm_ml_class_companion * c) 
00427 {
00428     uvm_ml_companion_map_type & map = get_companion_map();
00429     if (map[&actual_type] == 0) {
00430         map[&actual_type] = c;
00431         uvm_factory::register_class_creator(c->get_type_name(), c);
00432     } else
00433       delete c; // Otherwise there will be memory leak
00434     
00435     return true; // dummy return value needed to enable the function call in an initializer
00436 }
00437   
00438 uvm_ml_class_companion * uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(const type_info & actual_type) 
00439 {
00440     uvm_ml_companion_map_type & map = get_companion_map();
00441     uvm_ml_class_companion * c = map[&actual_type];
00442     if (c == NULL) {
00443       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00444       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00445     }
00446     return c;
00447 }
00448 
00449 string uvm_ml_class_company::get_type_name(const type_info & actual_type)
00450 {
00451     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00452     if (comp == NULL) {
00453       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00454       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00455       return "";
00456     }
00457     return comp->get_type_name();
00458 }
00459 
00460 void uvm_ml_class_company::update_class(const type_info & actual_type, void * target, void * src)
00461 {
00462     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00463     if (comp == NULL) {
00464       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00465       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00466       return;
00467     }
00468     comp->update(target, src);
00469 }
00470 
00471 ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(const type_info & actual_type) 
00472 {
00473     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00474     ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ret = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_ext_companion *>(comp);
00475     return ret;
00476 }
00477 
00478 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::update_tlm_generic_payload(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp, tlm_generic_payload * other) 
00479 {  
00480   // update response status
00481   tlm_gp->set_response_status(other->get_response_status());
00482 
00483   // update dmi
00484   tlm_gp->set_dmi_allowed(other->is_dmi_allowed());
00485 
00486   // update extensions   
00487   for (unsigned int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00488     tlm_extension_base * ext = tlm_gp->get_extension(j);
00489     if (ext) {
00490       ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ext_comp = ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(typeid(*ext));
00491       ext_comp->update(ext, other);
00492     }
00493   }  
00494 }
00495 
00496 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(uvm_ml_packer& p, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) 
00497 {
00498     tlm_extension_base * i_extension;
00499     unsigned int         i_extension_num = 0;
00500   
00501     if(tlm_gp == NULL) SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", "pack_tlm_generic_payload called with tlm_gp NULL");
00502     p << tlm_gp->get_address() << tlm_gp->get_command();
00503     p << tlm_gp->get_data_length();
00504     for (unsigned j = 0; j < tlm_gp->get_data_length(); j++) {
00505       p << (tlm_gp->get_data_ptr())[j];
00506     }
00507     p << tlm_gp->get_data_length() << tlm_gp->get_response_status();
00508 
00509     p << tlm_gp->is_dmi_allowed();
00510   
00511     p << tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length();
00512     for (unsigned j = 0; j < tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length(); j++) {
00513       p << (tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr())[j];
00514     }
00515   
00516     p << tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length() << tlm_gp->get_streaming_width();
00517     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00518       if (tlm_gp->get_extension(j))
00519         i_extension_num++;
00520     }
00521     p << i_extension_num;
00522     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00523       i_extension = tlm_gp->get_extension(j);
00524       if (i_extension) {
00525         // Size does not count the actual extensions
00526         p << i_extension;
00527       }
00528     }
00529 }
00530 
00531 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::unpack_tlm_generic_payload(uvm_ml_packer& p, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) 
00532 {
00533     sc_dt::uint64        i_m_address;
00534     int                  i_m_command;
00535     unsigned char*       i_m_data = 0;
00536     unsigned int         i_m_length;
00537     int                  i_m_response_status;
00538     bool                 i_m_dmi;
00539     unsigned char*       i_m_byte_enable = 0;
00540     unsigned int         i_m_byte_enable_length;
00541     unsigned int         i_m_streaming_width;
00542   
00543     unsigned int         length;
00544     unsigned int         i_extensions_size;
00545     tlm_extension_base * i_extension;
00546     stringstream msg;
00547   
00548     p >> i_m_address;
00549     tlm_gp->set_address(i_m_address);
00550   
00551     p >> i_m_command;
00552     tlm_gp->set_command(tlm_command(i_m_command));
00553   
00554     p >> length;
00555     if (length)
00556       i_m_data = new unsigned char [length];
00557     for (unsigned j = 0; j < length; j++)
00558       p >> i_m_data[j];
00559     tlm_gp->set_data_ptr(i_m_data);
00560   
00561     p >> i_m_length;
00562     msg << "do_unpack called with data length " << length << " different from m_length " << i_m_length;
00563     if(length != i_m_length) SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", msg.str().c_str());
00564     tlm_gp->set_data_length(i_m_length);
00565   
00566     p >> i_m_response_status;
00567 
00568     p >> i_m_dmi;
00569 
00570     tlm_gp->set_response_status(tlm_response_status(i_m_response_status));
00571   
00572     p >> i_m_byte_enable_length;
00573     if (i_m_byte_enable_length)
00574       i_m_byte_enable = new unsigned char [i_m_byte_enable_length];
00575     for (unsigned j = 0; j < i_m_byte_enable_length; j++)
00576       p >> i_m_byte_enable[j];
00577     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_ptr(i_m_byte_enable);
00578   
00579     p >> i_m_byte_enable_length;
00580     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_length(i_m_byte_enable_length);
00581   
00582     p >> i_m_streaming_width;
00583     tlm_gp->set_streaming_width(i_m_streaming_width);
00584   
00585     p >> i_extensions_size;
00586   
00587     i_extension = 0;
00588   
00589     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < i_extensions_size; j++) {
00590       p >> i_extension;
00591       if (i_extension) {
00592         unsigned int id = ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(typeid(*i_extension))->get_ext_id(i_extension);
00593         tlm_gp->set_auto_extension(id, i_extension);
00594       }
00595     }
00596 }
00597 
00598 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::clear(const type_info & actual_type, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp)
00599 {
00600   tlm_gp->free_all_extensions();
00601   if (tlm_gp->get_data_ptr()) {
00602     delete [] tlm_gp->get_data_ptr();
00603     tlm_gp->set_data_ptr(NULL);
00604   }
00605   if (tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr()) {
00606     delete [] tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr();
00607     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_ptr(NULL);
00608   }
00609   uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(actual_type);
00610   if (comp == NULL) {
00611     string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00612     SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00613     return;
00614   }
00615   comp->uvm_ml_automation(NULL, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP);
00616 }
00617 
00618 void  ml_tlm2_connector_base::register_top_of_the_socket_name(const string & sname) {
00619   if ((IN_ELABORATION() == false) && (uvm_ml_utils::quasi_static_elaboration_started() == false)) {
00620     // Need to register the static SystemC socket path at the backplane
00621     size_t posDelim = sname.find_first_of(".");
00622     string path_top;
00623     if (posDelim != string::npos)
00624       path_top = sname.substr(0, posDelim);
00625     else
00626       path_top = sname; // should be an error
00627 
00628     uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(path_top);
00629   }
00630 }
00631 
00632 }
